LanguageData.MainTabWindowDescription: This tab contains lots of useful functions. Clean,boost,or even fix your current savegame here.
LanguageData.DlgTextGCAdvice1: All unnecessary WorldPawns are removed. So you don't have to press this button again (for a considerably long time!).
LanguageData.DlgTextGCAdvice2: There are still {0} WorldPawn(s) to remove. Press again to complete a thorough clean-up.
LanguageData.DlgTextGCV: RuntimeGC: Check detailed output in Debug Log
